Title: When Good Kids Go Bad
Plot: Lily has problems with Mitchell and Cameron's plans to adopt another child, Jay tries to get Manny to confess to stealing a locket at school, and Claire goes to extreme lengths to prove that she was right in an argument.
ParentalRatingReason: PG Coarse language and sexual references
GuestStars: Laurel Coppock, Annie Tedesco, Amanda Musso
